Notes.Text:
This update for php53 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-21702 [bsc#1182049]: NULL pointer dereference in SoapClient
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: In PHP versions 7.3.x below 7.3.27, 7.4.x below 7.4.15 and 8.0.x below 8.0.2, when using SOAP extension to connect to a SOAP server, a malicious SOAP server could return malformed XML data as a response that would cause PHP to access a null pointer and thus cause a crash.
